title: Google rolls out Apple-like message summaries for Pixel phones
description: Alphabet Inc.'s Google is adding new artificial intelligence features to its Pixel devices, including iPhone-like message summaries and notification prioritization.
content:
(Bloomberg/Samantha Kelly) — Alphabet Inc.’s Google is adding new artificial intelligence features to its Pixel devices, including iPhone-like message summaries and notification prioritization.

title: number of winning AI stocks could narrow
description: CNBC's Jim Cramer expressed concern about OpenAI's ability to pay the billions it has committed to spend on artificial intelligence infrastructure.

title: Dow surges as traders bet on end to government shutdown
description: The Dow Jones Industrial Average surged to a record high close on Tuesday, lifted by progress toward ending the longest US government shutdown, while Nvidia and other artificial intelligence-related companies fell on renewed concerns about elevated valuations.

title: What AI earbuds can’t replace: The value of learning another language
description: Your host in Osaka, Japan, slips on a pair of headphones and suddenly hears your words transformed into flawless Kansai Japanese. title: Bitcoin mining a bust for TeraWulf, attention shifts to AI
description: TeraWulf is redirecting energy toward HPC, joining a wave of blockchain firms (i.e., Riot, CleanSpark and Galaxy) in betting its future on artificial intelligence.
content:
TeraWulf deliberately powered down bitcoin mining rigs this quarter to redirect energy toward high-performance computing, or HPC, joining a wave of blockchain firms betting their future on artificial intelligence.

title: Maharashtra Pollution Control Board Launches ‘GreenMind AI’ - An AI-Powered Environmental Information Assistant
description: The Maharashtra Pollution Control Board (MPCB) on Tuesday, officially launched GreenMind AI, an artificial intelligence-powered environmental information assistant, developed by Axion Labs.
content:

title: Is China about to win the AI race?
description: From subsidized power to open-source innovation, China is mounting a serious challenge to U.S. dominance in artificial intelligence.
content:
Hello, Beatrice Nolan here, filling in for Jeremy Kahn. The AI industry has been mulling a key question recently: Is China pulling ahead in the AI race?
It’s a debate sparked by Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang, who made headlines last week after stating that... [7198 chars]

title: AI can deliver personalized learning at scale, medical education study shows
description: A new Dartmouth study finds that artificial intelligence has the potential to deliver educational support that meets the individual needs of large numbers of students. The researchers are the first to report that students may put more trust in AI platforms programmed to pull answers from only curated expert sources, rather than from massive data sets of general information.
